Package com.example.hashcache.models.database_connections

Class CodeLocationConnectionHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.hashcache.models.database.DatabaseAdapters.CodeLocationDatabaseAdapter
  • public class CodeLocationConnectionHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles all calls to the Firebase CodeLocations database

    • Method Detail

      • makeInstance

        public static CodeLocationConnectionHandler makeInstance​(FireStoreHelper fireStoreHelper,
                                                         CodeLocationDocumentConverter codeLocationDataAdapter,
                                                         com.google.firebase.firestore.FirebaseFirestore db)
        Create the static instance of the CodeLocationConnectionHandler class
        Parameters:
        fireStoreHelper - the instance of the FireStoreHelper class to call upon to perform common firestore actions
        codeLocationDataAdapter - the instance of the CodeLocationDocumentConverter to use when converting a document to a CodeLocation object
        db - the instance of the database to use to get connections to the CodeLocation collection and its documents
        Returns:
        CodeLocationConnectionHandler.INSTANCE the static instance of the CodeLocationConnectionHandler class to use for all actions concerning the CodeLocation database collection
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the INSTANCE has already been initialized

      • resetInstance

        public static void resetInstance()
        Resets the static instance Should only be used for testing purposes

      • getInstance

        public CodeLocationConnectionHandler getInstance()
        Get the singleton instance of the CodeLocationConnectionHandler
        Returns:
        INSTANCE the singleton instance of the CodeLocationConnectionHandler
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the CodeLocationConnectionHandler instance hasn't been initialized yet

      • addCodeLocation

        public void addCodeLocation​(CodeLocation codeLocation,
                            BooleanCallback booleanCallback)
        Adds a code location to the database
        Parameters:
        codeLocation - the codelocation to add to the database
        booleanCallback - the callback function to call once the asynchronous database calls are done
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when the code location already exists in the database

      • getCodeLocation

        public void getCodeLocation​(java.lang.String id,
                            GetCodeLocationCallback getCodeLocationCallback)
        Gets a code location from the database
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the code location to get
        getCodeLocationCallback - the callback function to call with the location once it has been found
